actions.name: Mass Accelerator Machinegun
actions.hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage and 16 (3d10) radiant damage. The ymir mech can make a burst fire attack instead.

actions.name: Rocket Launcher
actions.description: The ymir mech targets an area within 60m. Each creature within 6m of the target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) thunder damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

features.name: Post-mortem Explosion
features.description: When the YMIR mech is reduced to 0 hit points, it self-destructs. Each creature within a 6m radius sphere must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 (4d10) thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.
